channel.title: How to find out Model and Animation ID's?
channel.description:
I've dumped the OSRS Model and Animations from the Cache.
Now for example i want chaos fanatic.
How would i find the model for the chaos fanatic? (besides searching through the 30k models) And how would i find out what Animations are the fanatic? as i got a big dump of 1900 animations.

item.title: How to find out Model and Animation ID's?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Unless you get the definitions for the items/npcs/whatever from the cache; there’s no way to find it besides sifting through all the models.

Same with the animation ids. If you can’t dump the defs from the cache, you’re gonna be doing ::anim 0, ::anim 1, ::anim 2, for a while…

Read full topic
item.source: How to find out Model and Animation ID's?
